title: How to Cancel Spotify Premium
description: Learn how to cancel your Spotify Premium subscription through the Spotify website, Spotify app, Google Play Store, or iOS App Store. Keep enjoying your Premium benefits until your next billing date.

web.title: Cancel Spotify Premium via Website
web.description:
Here's how to cancel your Spotify Premium subscription through the website:

*   Go to spotify.com and log in to your account.
*   Go to your Account Overview page.
*   Scroll down to the "Your Plan" section or find the "Manage Subscription" button.
*   Click "Change Plan".
*   Select "Cancel Premium" or the "Spotify Free" option.
*   Confirm your cancellation.

app.title: Cancel Spotify Premium via App
app.description:
Here's how to cancel your Spotify Premium subscription through the Spotify app:

*   Open the Spotify app and log in to your account.
*   Tap the “Home” icon.
*   Tap the gear (settings) icon.
*   Scroll down until you find the “Account” option.
*   Find the “Your Plan” section.
*   Select the “Change Plan” option and find the “Spotify Free” option.

ios.title: Cancel Spotify Premium via iOS App Store
ios.description:
Here's how to cancel your Spotify Premium subscription through the iOS App Store:

*   Open the “Settings” app on your iPhone or iPad.
*   Tap on your name at the top of the screen.
*   Select “Subscriptions”.
*   Find and tap on your Spotify subscription.
*   Tap “Cancel Subscription” and confirm your cancellation.

google_play.title: Cancel Spotify Premium via Google Play Store
google_play.description:
Here's how to cancel your Spotify Premium subscription through the Google Play Store:

*   Open the Google Play Store on your Android device.
*   Tap on your profile icon in the top right corner.
*   Select “Payments & subscriptions”.
*   Tap on “Subscriptions” and find Spotify in the list.
*   Tap “Cancel subscription” and follow the prompts to confirm.

seo_text: Cancel Spotify Premium subscription. Steps to cancel Spotify on website, app, Google Play, iOS. Downgrade Spotify to free. Stop Spotify payments.
